long_description: With an upright riding position, smooth carbon fork and nimble handling, the Cannondale Quick 4 women's bike combines comfort and speed for just about any type of pavement-based riding. Carbon fork, shaped chainstays and seatstays help absorb road vibrations; flat handlebar places you in a comfortable, upright riding position. 6061 aluminum frame uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to effectively damp road vibration. Ergonomically shaped rubber grips offer plush padding underhand. Shimano derailleurs and shifters supply dependable shifts through the 24 gear combinations. Kenda Kwick Trax tires feature a versatile tread pattern to handle city riding. Eyelets accept fenders or a rack (not included). Linear-pull brakes; platform pedals. Specs on the Cannondale Quick 4 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: With an upright riding position, smooth carbon fork and nimble handling, the Cannondale Quick 4 women's bike combines comfort and speed for just about any type of pavement-based riding.
